name: cloudflex-assignment
description: CloudFlex Project Management Portal - Full Stack Application

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run create-env
scripts.create-env:
node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const env = fs.readFileSync('.env', 'utf8'); const frontendEnv = env.split('
').filter(line => line.includes('NEXT_PUBLIC')).join('
'); fs.writeFileSync('frontend/.env.local', frontendEnv + '
');"
